title: finding my old posts
body: where do i go to search for my posts. when i try to click boards profile form the drop down in the top right, it says page not found.

replies.body: Try clicking on your own name in this post to see if that will take you to your profile so that you can see those posts. If that doesn't work, you might need to [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).
nailed it thats the trick. thanks
